alert.note: Alert for Allen (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 12:21AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Allen County through 1245 AM CDT... At 1220 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kincaid to 7 miles southeast of Humboldt. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Iola, Humboldt, La Harpe, Gas, Moran, Savonburg, Elsmore, Mildred, Bassett, Iola Airport and Petrolia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern Kansas.
